pleaseCheckEmail: Please check your inbox and verify your email
msgBoxAccountExists: Account with this name already exists, please use a different email address or select forgot password to reset account credentials
congrats: Select how to access, Web or Desktop version?
webDeskText:
Both the Web and Desktop save your data to the cloud, itâ€™s just that the Desktop version loads faster and has a few minor enhancements.
Best of all both versions are 100% FREE, so you switch between the two at any time... so no big decisions here.
playerWinMsg: Run the SignagePlayer on any version of Microsoft Windows and turn your personal computer into a dedicated Digital Signage Player
playerAndMsg: Run the SignagePlayer Mobile version on Android tablets and phones. Install it from the Android Market place.
bootBoxEnterEmail: Please enter a valid email address...
bootBoxCanNotAuthenticate: Sorry, can not authenticate your user or password
bootBoxOldBrowser: your browser is too old, please install StudioPro Desktop version or use google chrome
bootboxNoProbOnMobile: StudioPro is supported only on Windows and Mac. On mobile devices you can use StudioLite instead...
bootBoxAlphaNumeric: Only A - Z and 0 - 9 are allowed for password selection
directDownloadtxt1: You can download here the binaries of both StudioPro and SignagePlayer directly if you prefer, instead of going through the standard setup procedure.
directDownloadtxt2: Simply select the operating system that you are interested in and continue to download the proper installation file.
bootBoxCheckEmail: e-mail sent, please check your email now...
bootBoxInvalidEmail: The e-mail entered is invalid, please fix and try again
embedMsg: Use an HTML snippet to embed your presentation as part of a web page.
downloadPlayerIOSX: Run the SignagePlayer Mobile version on iPads and iPhones. Install it from the App store.
playerEmbed: Embed the SignagePlayer in a web page
